‚Ä¢ Base: Propylene Glycol* ‚Ä¢ Dosage: 0.05%-0.15% ‚Ä¢ Odor description: Mochi flavor profile | Purity: 100% | concentrate flavor for ejuice | Odor: fresh | Certification: ISO,HALAL | Color: colorless Statue: Water&oil Solouble | Shelf life: 3 Years - www.duomeiflavor.cn

- - -
üìë Japanese rice cake made of mochigome (glutinous rice)...rice is pounded into paste & molded into the desired shape | amylose content is negligible = gel-like consistency.

‚óºÔ∏è...Plain, natural mochi...main ingredient is either Shiratamako or Mochiko (Japanese sweet glutinous rice flours) |  Shiratamako & Mochiko are made from Mochigome... Japanese glutinous short grain rice....difference...comes from texture & processing ... Shiratamako flour = more refined...finer flour...smoother, more elastic feel. Mochiko is less refined... doughier texture.  | Traditional & Modern Preparation  - en.wikipedia.org
__________________________________________________
**10/25/2017**

 

Single Flavor Test: **0.1%**
60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton

**11/08/2017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

---- Round Body | Velvety & Dense with an Soft Mouth Feel
